author: Ashutosh Kumar

comments.message: Hi Ashutosh, interesting post! Any chance you could find an image to go along with it? Images help grab attention and tell a story with higher impact. You should be able to use the Update Entry button on the right of your post and follow the instructions to add images from there. We know occasionally people have issues uploading images so let us know by hitting the Feedback button at the bottom of most pages of our site if you face any problems. Looking forward to seeing more of your inspiring insights on OpenIDEO. And here's some tips on adding visual goodness to your idea: http://ideo.pn/vis-uals plus more on evolving your thought-starter: http://ideo.pn/oi-evolve

summary: Proteases are essential to cleave the Ebola virus envelope glycoprotein which is a necessary step in Ebola infection. Natural (herbal protease inhibitors may slow or halt this necessary step.
title: Use natural protease inhibitors to halt Ebola virus glycoprotein cleavage necessary for infection
